name: Chef John's Mushroom Gravy
author: Chef John
summary: Mushroom sauce can be done with any type of stock, but I used beef stock here since I'm going to be serving with meatloaf.
ingredients: ¼ cup all-purpose flour, or as needed
1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch fresh thyme leaves, to taste
directions: Heat butter over medium heat in a saucepan until it foams
Simmer until liquid evaporates, about 20 minutes
Stir in the flour, cooking and stirring for about 5 minutes
Add about 1 cup of beef stock, stirring briskly until incorporated, then pour in the remaining stock and mix thoroughly
Season with black pepper and thyme
Reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until thickened, about 30 minutes, stirring often
